00090 template<typename TreeT>
00091 struct PointDataAccessor {
00092     typedef typename TreeT::ValueType       ValueType;
00093     typedef typename TreeT::LeafNodeType    LeafNode;
00094     typedef typename TreeT::LeafNodeType::ValueType PointIndexT;
00095     typedef typename TreeT::LeafNodeType::ValueTypePair PointDataIndex;
00096 
00097     explicit PointDataAccessor(const TreeT& tree)
00098         : mTree(&tree)
00099         , mAccessor(tree) { }
00100 
00103 
00104     PointDataIndex get(const Coord& ijk) const;
00105 
00108     Index64 pointCount(const Coord& ijk) const;
00109 
00115     Index64 totalPointCount(const point_masks::PointCountMask mask = point_masks::Active) const;
00116 
00117     tree::ValueAccessor<const TreeT>& valueAccessor() const { return mAccessor; }
00118 
00120 
00122     const TreeT& tree() const { assert(mTree); return *mTree; }
00123 
00124 private:
00125     typedef tree::ValueAccessor<const TreeT>  ConstAccessor;
00126     const TreeT* mTree;
00127     mutable ConstAccessor mAccessor;
00128 }; // struct PointDataAccessor
00129 
00130 // PointDataAccessor implementation
00131 
00132 template<typename TreeT>
00133 inline typename PointDataAccessor<TreeT>::PointDataIndex
00134 PointDataAccessor<TreeT>::get(const Coord& ijk) const
00135 {
00136     typedef typename TreeT::LeafNodeType::ValueType PointIndexT;
00137 
00138     const LeafNode* leaf = mAccessor.probeConstLeaf(ijk);
00139 
00140     // leaf not active - no particles
00141 
00142     if (!leaf) return std::make_pair(0, 0);
00143 
00144     const unsigned index = LeafNode::coordToOffset(ijk);
00145 
00146     return leaf->pointIndex(index);
00147 }
00148 
00149 
00150 template<typename TreeT>
00151 inline Index64
00152 PointDataAccessor<TreeT>::pointCount(const Coord& ijk) const
00153 {
00154     PointDataIndex index = get(ijk);
00155 
00156     return index.second - index.first;
00157 }
00158 
00159 template<typename TreeT>
00160 inline Index64
00161 PointDataAccessor<TreeT>::totalPointCount(const point_masks::PointCountMask mask) const
00162 {
00163     typedef typename TreeT::LeafCIter LeafCIter;
00164 
00165     Index64 count = 0;
00166 
00167     for (LeafCIter iter = mTree->cbeginLeaf(); iter; ++iter) {
00168         const LeafNode* leaf = iter.getLeaf();
00169 
00170         Index64 size = leaf->pointCount(mask);
00171 
00172         count += size;
00173     }
00174 
00175     return count;
00176 }

00184 struct UniquePtr
00185 {
00186 #ifdef OPENVDB_HAS_CXX11
00187     typedef std::unique_ptr<T>  type;
00188 #else
00189     typedef std::auto_ptr<T>    type;
00190 #endif
00191 };

00195 template <typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00196 class PointDataLeafNode : public tree::LeafNode<T, Log2Dim> {
00197 
00198 public:
00199     typedef PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>           LeafNodeType;
00200     typedef boost::shared_ptr<PointDataLeafNode>    Ptr;
00201 
00202     typedef T                                       ValueType;
00203     typedef std::pair<ValueType, ValueType>         ValueTypePair;
00204     typedef std::vector<ValueType>                  IndexArray;
00205 
00206     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor                Descriptor;
00207 
00209 
00210     // The following methods had to be copied from the LeafNode class
00211     // to make the derived PointDataLeafNode class compatible with the tree structure.
00212 
00213     typedef tree::LeafNode<T, Log2Dim>    BaseLeaf;
00214     typedef util::NodeMask<Log2Dim> NodeMaskType;
00215 
00216     using BaseLeaf::LOG2DIM;
00217     using BaseLeaf::TOTAL;
00218     using BaseLeaf::DIM;
00219     using BaseLeaf::NUM_VALUES;
00220     using BaseLeaf::NUM_VOXELS;
00221     using BaseLeaf::SIZE;
00222     using BaseLeaf::LEVEL;
00223 
00225     PointDataLeafNode()
00226         : BaseLeaf()
00227         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet) { }
00228 
00229     ~PointDataLeafNode() { }
00230 
00232     explicit PointDataLeafNode(const PointDataLeafNode& other)
00233         : BaseLeaf(other)
00234         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet(*other.mAttributeSet)) { }
00235 
00237     explicit
00238     PointDataLeafNode(const Coord& coords, const T& value = zeroVal<T>(), bool active = false)
00239         : BaseLeaf(coords, value, active)
00240         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet) { }
00241 
00244     PointDataLeafNode(const PointDataLeafNode& other, const Coord& coords, const T& value = zeroVal<T>(), bool active = false)
00245         : BaseLeaf(coords, value, active)
00246         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet(*other.mAttributeSet)) { }
00247 
00248     // Copy-construct from a PointIndexLeafNode with the same configuration but a different ValueType.
00249     template<typename OtherValueType>
00250     PointDataLeafNode(const tools::PointIndexLeafNode<OtherValueType, Log2Dim>& other)
00251         : BaseLeaf(other)
00252         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet) { }
00253 
00254     // Copy-construct from a LeafNode with the same configuration but a different ValueType.
00255     // Used for topology copies - explicitly sets the value (background) to zeroVal
00256     template <typename ValueType>
00257     PointDataLeafNode(const tree::LeafNode<ValueType, Log2Dim>& other, const T& value, TopologyCopy)
00258         : BaseLeaf(other, zeroVal<T>(), TopologyCopy())
00259         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet) { }
00260

00264         : BaseLeaf(PartialCreate(), coords, value, active)
00265         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet) { }

00270     const AttributeSet& attributeSet() const
00271     {
00272         return *mAttributeSet;
00273     }
00274 
00277     void initializeAttributes(const Descriptor::Ptr& descriptor, const size_t arrayLength)
00278     {
00279         mAttributeSet.reset(new AttributeSet(descriptor, arrayLength));
00280     }
00281 
00283     void clearAttributes()
00284     {
00285         mAttributeSet.reset(new AttributeSet(mAttributeSet->descriptorPtr(), 0));
00286 
00287         for (Index n = 0; n < LeafNodeType::NUM_VALUES; n++) {
00288             this->setOffsetOn(n, 0);
00289         }
00290     }

00295     template <typename TypedAttributeArrayType>
00296     bool hasAttribute(const size_t pos) const
00297     {
00298         if (pos >= mAttributeSet->size())     return false;
00299 
00300         const AttributeArray* array = mAttributeSet->getConst(pos);
00301 
00302         return array->isType<TypedAttributeArrayType>();
00303     }
00304 
00307     template <typename TypedAttributeArrayType>
00308     bool hasAttribute(const Name& attributeName) const
00309     {
00310         const size_t pos = mAttributeSet->find(attributeName);
00311 
00312         if (pos == AttributeSet::INVALID_POS)   return false;
00313 
00314         return hasAttribute<TypedAttributeArrayType>(pos);
00315     }
00316 
00318     void appendAttribute(const AttributeSet::Util::NameAndType& attribute,
00319                          const Descriptor& expected, Descriptor::Ptr& replacement)
00320     {
00321         mAttributeSet->appendAttribute(attribute, expected, replacement);
00322     }
00323 
00324     template <typename AttributeType>
00325     AttributeWriteHandle<AttributeType>* attributeWriteHandle(const size_t pos)
00326     {
00327         if (pos >= mAttributeSet->size())             OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Attribute Out Of Range");
00328 
00329         AttributeArray* array = mAttributeSet->get(pos);
00330 
00331         return new AttributeWriteHandle<AttributeType>(*array);
00332     }
00333 
00334     template <typename AttributeType>
00335     AttributeWriteHandle<AttributeType>* attributeWriteHandle(const Name& attributeName)
00336     {
00337         const size_t pos = mAttributeSet->find(attributeName);
00338 
00339         if (pos == AttributeSet::INVALID_POS)         OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Attribute Not Found");
00340 
00341         AttributeArray* array = mAttributeSet->get(pos);
00342 
00343         return new AttributeWriteHandle<AttributeType>(*array);
00344     }

00368     template <typename TypedAttributeType>
00369     TypedAttributeType& typedAttributeArray(const size_t pos)
00370     {
00371         if (pos >= mAttributeSet->size())             OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Attribute Out Of Range");
00372 
00373         AttributeArray* array = mAttributeSet->get(pos);
00374 
00375         if (!array->isType<TypedAttributeType>())     OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Invalid Attribute Type");
00376 
00377         return static_cast<TypedAttributeType& >(*array);
00378     }
00379 
00380     template <typename TypedAttributeType>

00383         const size_t pos = mAttributeSet->find(attributeName);

00385         if (pos == AttributeSet::INVALID_POS)         OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Attribute Not Found");

00387         AttributeArray* array = mAttributeSet->get(pos);

00389         if (!array->isType<TypedAttributeType>())     OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Invalid Attribute Type");

00406     template <typename TypedAttributeType>
00407     const TypedAttributeType& typedAttributeArray(const Name& attributeName) const
00408     {
00409         const size_t pos = mAttributeSet->find(attributeName);
00410 
00411         if (pos == AttributeSet::INVALID_POS)         OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Attribute Not Found");
00412 
00413         const AttributeArray* array = mAttributeSet->getConst(pos);
00414 
00415         if (!array->isType<TypedAttributeType>())     OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Invalid Attribute Type");
00416 
00417         return static_cast<const TypedAttributeType& >(*array);
00418     }
00419 
00420     ValueTypePair pointIndex(const unsigned index) const
00421     {
00422         assert(index < BaseLeaf::SIZE);
00423 
00424         const ValueType end = this->getValue(index);
00425 
00426         const ValueType start = (index == 0) ? ValueType(0) : this->getValue(index - 1);
00427 
00428         return std::make_pair(start, end);
00429     }
00430 
00431     Index64 pointCount(const unsigned n) const
00432     {
00433         ValueTypePair index = this->pointIndex(n);
00434 
00435         return index.second - index.first;
00436     }
00437 
00438     Index64 pointCount(const point_masks::PointCountMask mask = point_masks::Active) const
00439     {
00440         const util::NodeMask<Log2Dim>& valueMask = this->getValueMask();
00441 
00442         // return the number of points in every voxel if the mask matches the ValueMask
00443         // or mask == All
00444         if ((mask == point_masks::All)                              ||
00445             (mask == point_masks::Active && valueMask.isOn())       ||
00446             (mask == point_masks::Inactive && valueMask.isOff()))   return this->getValue(NUM_VOXELS - 1);
00447 
00448         // if the leaf is off and we are querying active points, or
00449         // if the leaf is on and we are querying inactive points, return 0
00450         if ((mask == point_masks::Active && valueMask.isOff())          ||
00451             (mask == point_masks::Inactive && valueMask.isOn()))    return 0;
00452 
00453         // otherwise portions of the leaf are inactive/active. loop to find these
00454         // depending on the mask
00455         Index64 totalPointCount = 0;
00456 
00457         const bool active = mask == point_masks::Active;
00458         const bool inactive = mask == point_masks::Inactive;
00459 
00460         for (unsigned i = 0; i < NUM_VOXELS; i++)
00461         {
00462             bool valueOn = this->isValueOn(i);
00463             if((valueOn && active) || (!valueOn && inactive))
00464             {
00465                 ValueTypePair index = this->pointIndex(i);
00466                 totalPointCount += (index.second - index.first);
00467             }
00468         }
00469 
00470         return totalPointCount;
00471     }
00472 
00473     void deactivateEmptyVoxels()
00474     {
00475         for (Index n = 0; n < LeafNodeType::NUM_VALUES; n++) {
00476             if (this->pointCount(n) > 0)         continue;
00477 
00478             this->setValueMaskOff(n);
00479         }
00480     }
00481 
00483 
00484     void setOffsetOn(Index offset, const ValueType& val)
00485     {
00486         this->buffer().setValue(offset, val);
00487         this->setValueMaskOn(offset);
00488     }
00489 
00490     void setOffsetOnly(Index offset, const ValueType& val)
00491     {
00492         this->buffer().setValue(offset, val);
00493     }

00505     bool operator==(const PointDataLeafNode& other) const {
00506         if(BaseLeaf::operator==(other) != true) return false;
00507         return (*this->mAttributeSet == *other.mAttributeSet);
00508     }

00663         MaskOnIterator, const PointDataLeafNode, const ValueType, ValueOn> ValueOnCIter;

00665         MaskOffIterator, PointDataLeafNode, const ValueType, ValueOff> ValueOffIter;

00669         MaskDenseIterator, PointDataLeafNode, const ValueType, ValueAll> ValueAllIter;
00670     typedef typename BaseLeaf::template ValueIter<
00671         MaskDenseIterator,const PointDataLeafNode,const ValueType,ValueAll> ValueAllCIter;
00672     typedef typename BaseLeaf::template ChildIter<
00673         MaskOnIterator, PointDataLeafNode, ChildOn> ChildOnIter;
00674     typedef typename BaseLeaf::template ChildIter<
00675         MaskOnIterator, const PointDataLeafNode, ChildOn> ChildOnCIter;
00676     typedef typename BaseLeaf::template ChildIter<
00677         MaskOffIterator, PointDataLeafNode, ChildOff> ChildOffIter;
00678     typedef typename BaseLeaf::template ChildIter<
00679         MaskOffIterator, const PointDataLeafNode, ChildOff> ChildOffCIter;
00680     typedef typename BaseLeaf::template DenseIter<
00681         PointDataLeafNode, ValueType, ChildAll> ChildAllIter;
00682     typedef typename BaseLeaf::template DenseIter<
00683         const PointDataLeafNode, const ValueType, ChildAll> ChildAllCIter;
00684 
00685 #define VMASK_ this->getValueMask()
00686     ValueOnCIter  cbeginValueOn() const  { return ValueOnCIter(VMASK_.beginOn(), this); }
00687     ValueOnCIter   beginValueOn() const  { return ValueOnCIter(VMASK_.beginOn(), this); }
00688     ValueOnIter    beginValueOn()        { return ValueOnIter(VMASK_.beginOn(), this); }
00689     ValueOffCIter cbeginValueOff() const { return ValueOffCIter(VMASK_.beginOff(), this); }
00690     ValueOffCIter  beginValueOff() const { return ValueOffCIter(VMASK_.beginOff(), this); }
00691     ValueOffIter   beginValueOff()       { return ValueOffIter(VMASK_.beginOff(), this); }
00692     ValueAllCIter cbeginValueAll() const { return ValueAllCIter(VMASK_.beginDense(), this); }
00693     ValueAllCIter  beginValueAll() const { return ValueAllCIter(VMASK_.beginDense(), this); }
00694     ValueAllIter   beginValueAll()       { return ValueAllIter(VMASK_.beginDense(), this); }
00695 
00696     ValueOnCIter  cendValueOn() const    { return ValueOnCIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00697     ValueOnCIter   endValueOn() const    { return ValueOnCIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00698     ValueOnIter    endValueOn()          { return ValueOnIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00699     ValueOffCIter cendValueOff() const   { return ValueOffCIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00700     ValueOffCIter  endValueOff() const   { return ValueOffCIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00701     ValueOffIter   endValueOff()         { return ValueOffIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00702     ValueAllCIter cendValueAll() const   { return ValueAllCIter(VMASK_.endDense(), this); }
00703     ValueAllCIter  endValueAll() const   { return ValueAllCIter(VMASK_.endDense(), this); }
00704     ValueAllIter   endValueAll()         { return ValueAllIter(VMASK_.endDense(), this); }
00705 
00706     ChildOnCIter  cbeginChildOn() const  { return ChildOnCIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00707     ChildOnCIter   beginChildOn() const  { return ChildOnCIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00708     ChildOnIter    beginChildOn()        { return ChildOnIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00709     ChildOffCIter cbeginChildOff() const { return ChildOffCIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00710     ChildOffCIter  beginChildOff() const { return ChildOffCIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00711     ChildOffIter   beginChildOff()       { return ChildOffIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00712     ChildAllCIter cbeginChildAll() const { return ChildAllCIter(VMASK_.beginDense(), this); }
00713     ChildAllCIter  beginChildAll() const { return ChildAllCIter(VMASK_.beginDense(), this); }
00714     ChildAllIter   beginChildAll()       { return ChildAllIter(VMASK_.beginDense(), this); }
00715 
00716     ChildOnCIter  cendChildOn() const    { return ChildOnCIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00717     ChildOnCIter   endChildOn() const    { return ChildOnCIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00718     ChildOnIter    endChildOn()          { return ChildOnIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00719     ChildOffCIter cendChildOff() const   { return ChildOffCIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00720     ChildOffCIter  endChildOff() const   { return ChildOffCIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00721     ChildOffIter   endChildOff()         { return ChildOffIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00722     ChildAllCIter cendChildAll() const   { return ChildAllCIter(VMASK_.endDense(), this); }
00723     ChildAllCIter  endChildAll() const   { return ChildAllCIter(VMASK_.endDense(), this); }
00724     ChildAllIter   endChildAll()         { return ChildAllIter(VMASK_.endDense(), this); }
00725 #undef VMASK_
00726 }; // struct PointDataLeafNode
00727 
00728 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00729 inline void
00730 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::readTopology(std::istream& is, bool fromHalf)
00731 {
00732     BaseLeaf::readTopology(is, fromHalf);
00733 }
00734 
00735 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00736 inline void
00737 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::writeTopology(std::ostream& os, bool toHalf) const
00738 {
00739     BaseLeaf::writeTopology(os, toHalf);
00740 }
00741 
00742 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00743 inline void
00744 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::readBuffers(std::istream& is, bool fromHalf)
00745 {
00746     BaseLeaf::readBuffers(is, fromHalf);
00747 
00748     mAttributeSet->read(is);
00749 }
00750 
00751 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00752 inline void
00753 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::readBuffers(std::istream& is, const CoordBBox& bbox, bool fromHalf)
00754 {
00755     // Read and clip voxel values (no clipping yet).
00756     BaseLeaf::readBuffers(is, bbox, fromHalf);
00757 
00758     mAttributeSet->read(is);
00759 }
00760 
00761 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00762 inline void
00763 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::writeBuffers(std::ostream& os, bool toHalf) const
00764 {
00765     BaseLeaf::writeBuffers(os, toHalf);
00766 
00767     mAttributeSet->write(os);
00768 }
00769 
00770 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00771 inline Index64
00772 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::memUsage() const
00773 {
00774     return BaseLeaf::memUsage() + mAttributeSet->memUsage();
00775 }
